Title: Silverlight 4 Netflix Browser
Description: Demonstrates using a WCF Data Client in Silverlight 4 to browse movie titles with the Netflix OData API announced at MIX 10.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Demonstrates using a WCF Data Client in Silverlight 4 to browse movie titles with the Netflix OData API announced at MIX 10.

Requirements
To run the project you will need to have the Silverlight 4 RC, Silverlight 4 SDK, and Visual Studio 2010 RC.
You can try the application at: http://christopherdeweese.com/Silverlight4Netflix/Default.html

For more information about OData: http://www.odata.org
For more information about Silverlight 4: http://silverlight.net/
For more information about the NetFlix OData API: http://developer.netflix.com/blog/read/Announcing_the_OData_Catalog_API_Preview



Application Screenshot


Known Issues
-Titles are not in alphabetical order
-Some Genres do not load any titles - This may be a limitation of the preview API
-It's not that pretty. First crack at a Silverlight App >>Chris
